ARABIC: وَمَن يَقُلْ مِنْهُمْ إِنِّىٓ إِلَٰهٌ مِّن دُونِهِۦ فَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِيهِ جَهَنَّمَ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Were any of them to say, 'I am a god apart from Him,' We would repay him with Hell. That is how We repay wrongdoers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: If any one of them said: "I am God besides Him," We should award him Hell; for this is how We requite the evil-doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And if anyone of them were to claim: "Indeed I am a god apart from Him," We shall recompense both with Hell. Thus do We recompense the wrong-doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The recompense of those of them who say that they are the Lord instead of God will be hell; thus, do We recompense the unjust ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And the one among them who says, “I am a God beside Allah” – We shall reward him with hell; this is how We punish the unjust.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And if any of them should say: "Verily, I am a god besides Him," such We should recompense with Hell. Thus We recompense the wrongdoers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And whoever of them should say: Surely I am a god besides Him, such a one do We recompense with hell; thus do, We recompense the unjust.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: If any of them says, 'I am a god apart from Him', such a one We recompense with Gehenna; even so We recompense the evildoers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And one of them who should say: Lo! I am a god beside Him, that one We should repay with hell. Thus We Repay wrong-doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Whoever of them should say, "I am a deity besides Him," shall be requited with Hell. Thus do We reward the wrongdoers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And whosoever of them should say: verily I am a god beside Him, such a one We shall requite with Hell; Thus We requite the wrong- doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Should any of them say, ‘I am a god besides Him,’ We will requite him with hell. Thus do We requite the wrongdoers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: If any of them should say, "I am a god besides Him", such a one We should reward with Hell: thus do We reward those who do wrong.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And if any of them should say: "Verily, I am an ilah (a god) besides Him (Allah)," such a one We should recompense with Hell. Thus We recompense the Zalimun (polytheists and wrong-doers, etc.).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: If any one of them says: 'I am a god other than Him' We will recompense him with Gehenna (Hell). As such We recompense the harmdoers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And whoever of them says, “I am a god besides Him,” We will reward him with Hell. Thus We reward the wrongdoers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And whoever of them should say, "Indeed, I am a god besides Him"- that one We would recompense with Hell. Thus do We recompense the wrongdoers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:29] And should any of them say, ‘I am a god besides Him’, that is, [besides] God, in other words, [a god] other than Him — and this is Iblīs, who summoned [others] to worship his soul and commanded that it be obeyed — such a one We will requite with Hell. Thus, in the same way that We requite him, We requite wrongdoers, idolaters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And one of them) of the angels; and it is said this means: of created beings (who should say: Lo! I am a God beside Him) beside Allah, (that one We should repay with hell) Hell will be his lot because of this. (Thus We repay wrong-doers) thus We repay disbelievers.
